ygData.messageBody:
Before I rant, I'd like to clearly point out that neither Slyde or myself
ever said anything derrogatory about the GM's. Also, both of us DID take
responsibility for our own situations. Perhaps if I quote my post:

Jeez that sounds familiar. Same thing happened to a ranger and a warrior
from my guild. Same spot and all. And in our situation, the GM's still
said tough sh*t. We finally managed to do the CR after a 6 hour stint with
the help of a level 30 something Shaman and Druid. It was a nightmare.
Glad it worked out for you.

When I said that the GM said tough sh*t, I was paraphrasing. The GM said
that we needed to find a way to get the corpses ourselves. That we did.
And no one went crying as you so eloquently put it. Nowhere in either
Slyde's or my posts did it say that we expected the GM to do a damn thing.
I was simply stating that I have seen that same point at which he died and I
knowits a tough spot, but I am glad it all worked out for him.

For the record, I have never bugged anything. I have never petitioned for
anything. I thoroughly enjoy my character and the way he plays, despite the
flaws. What I have grown incredibly tired of however is the recurring
flames on this list. Perhaps before you post your retort, you should
attempt to read between the lines on a post. Instead of downing every post
that you disagree with, take a position, state it and move on.

We're all glad to have the info that comes through this list from the likes
of John, Shada, Harmonic and many others. I look forward to reading this
list. If people who don't have the experience that you do post something
that is inaccurate, correct it, don't laugh at it in public.

Weiland
<Disciples of Truth>
Erollisi Marr

PS - Oh and to answer your hopes, yes, I have made quite a few friends.
